scripts.prepare: test -d .git && cd .git/hooks/ && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Buzut/git-emojis-hook/master/commit-msg && curl -O https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Buzut/git-emojis-hook/master/prepare-commit-msg && chmod +x * || exit 0
scripts.css:build:prod: mkdir -p public/styles/ && lessc styles/main.less | postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' | cssmin > public/styles/main-$npm_package_version.min.css
scripts.js:build: npm run js:esmbuild && npm run js:iifebuild
scripts.optimise:webp: mkdir -p public/img && find ./img \( -name '*.jpg' -o -name '*.jpeg' -o -name '*.png' -o -name '*.gif' \) -execdir bash -c 'dir=`pwd | sed 's/img//'`; imagemin -p=webp $1 > "$dir"public/img/$1.webp' _ {} \;
scripts.optimise:all: npm run optimise:jpg && npm run optimise:png && npm run optimise:gif && npm run optimise:svg && npm run optimise:webp
scripts.compress:all: npm run compress:css && npm run compress:js && npm run compress:svg
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run template:build && npm run copyFonts && npm run css:build:prod && npm run js:build && npm run optimise:all && npm run compress:all
scripts.watch: npm run compress:clean && npm run serve && npm run template:watch & npm run css:watch & npm run js:watch
